  Professional Experience

	Project: 
	Cholamandalam – Collection Scorecard

	Duration: 
	January 2018 –  Till date

	Role:
	Sr. Consultant BI

	Project Description: 
	Cholamandalam Investment and Finance Company Limited is a financial and investment service provider in India. It is headquartered in Chennai and has 885 branches across the country. It is one of the 28 businesses under the Murugappa Group.
Collection Scorecard contains various reports having the data about all the collection of loans. 

	Responsibilities:
	· Understanding the BRD, creating SRS and Prototype.
· Building the data model, applying the incremental load.
· Discussion of the requirements with the different stakeholders of the business.
· Developing dashboards using BI tool Qlik Sense.
· Applying Sheet, Object, and row level security.
·  UAT and Unit Testing.

	Technologies: 
	 Qlik sense, MS SQL server, Excel


					
	Project: 
	RJ Corp – Cream Bell - DMS

	Duration: 
	October 2018 – January 2018 

	Role:
	Sr. Consultant BI

	Project Description: 
	RJ Corp is a powerhouse multinational with thriving businesses in beverages, fast-food restaurants, retail, ice-cream, dairy products, healthcare and education.
Cream Bell DMS is a BI project developed through Qlik view, which is used by the business users to keep the track about the inventory of all the distributors along with the Primary and Secondary Sales. It had all the comparisons like Value vs Volume, top 10 analysis, Quarterly – yearly and monthly comparisons.


	Responsibilities:
	· Understanding the BRD, 
· Discussion of the requirements with the different stakeholders of the dashboards.
· Developing a data model and dashboards using BI tool QlikView.
· Applying Sheet, Object, and row level security.
· Refreshing, Scheduling and distribution of the dashboards in the QlikView Access Point from the QlikView Management Console
· UAT and Unit Testing.

	Technologies: 
	 QlikView 12, MS SQL server, Excel


					
	Project: 
	RJ Corp – Nike

	Duration: 
	October 2018 

	Role:
	Sr. Consultant BI

	Project Description: 
	RJ Corp is a powerhouse multinational with thriving businesses in beverages, fast-food restaurants, retail, ice-cream, dairy products, healthcare and education.
RJ Corp Nike have around 50 stores all over India and it takes care of the retail and inventory of all the stores. They had the requirement to automate their reporting system through Qlik.


	Responsibilities:
	· Understanding all of the report sets through intensive sessions with the MIS users, 
· Discussion of the requirements with the different stakeholders of the business.
· Developing a Prototype for the users to give them touch and field of the Qlik Sense .
· Creating the SRS document.
· Estimating the efforts.

	Technologies: 
	 Qlik Sense , MS SQL server, Excel


								
	Project: 
	Renault – RIPL

	Duration: 
	May 2018 – October 2018 

	Role:
	Sr. Consultant BI

	Project Description: 
	RIPL - IRIS delivers QlikView solutions across all its dealers, Area mangers, zone heads giving them insights on their Sales, Services and Parts. With the sales module Renault is able to analyze the target and actual value of their major KPI’s like no. of Enquiries, Test Drives, Bookings and deliveries. With Service module Renault is able to analyze various KPI’s like IFC (Immediate feedback), PSF (Post Service), Estimate variation, Repeat & Revisit %. 

	Responsibilities:
	· Understanding the BRD, 
· Discussion of the requirements with the different stakeholders of the dashboards.
· Developing a data model and dashboards using BI tool QlikView.
· Supporting the users with access management and their queries related to the RIPL.
· Refreshing, Scheduling and distribution of the dashboards in the QlikView Access Point from the QlikView Management Console
· Management of all the Servers: production, NPrinting and development.
· Ensuring the data reports and figuring out the reason for mismatch by comparing the data from DMS and RIPL-IRIS.
· Resolving tickets on Renault assist related to RIPL-IRIS within the time speculated by SLA.

	Technologies: 
	 QlikView 12, Oracle 11g, Excel


					
	Project: 
	Carrier - United Technologies

	Duration: 
	Feb 2018 – May 2018 

	Role:
	Sr. Consultant BI

	Project Description: 
	Carrier delivers global solutions across a broad range of applications in heating, air-conditioning, refrigeration and beyond. The BI project involved following AMC, Sales, Service and Booking. The KPI’s involved were : Fresh equipment, pending for renewal equipment, Retained & Recaptured equipment and Lost Equipment

	Responsibilities:
	· Understanding the BRD, 
· Discussion of the requirements with the different stakeholders of the dashboards
· Developing a data model and dashboards using BI tool Qlik Sense
· The dashboards include various Reports and KPIs to show the Trades, Confirmations, Settlements, Asset Services of the company.
· Refreshing, Scheduling and distribution of the dashboards in the Qlik Sense Access Point from the Qlik Sense Management Console
· Unit Testing by firing queries in the database

	Technologies: 
	 Qlik Sense, SAP R3, Excel


					
	Project: 
	GSI Health CC

	Duration: 
	February 2017 - January 2018

	Role:
	BI Consultant and L2/L3 SQL Support analyst 

	Project Description: 
	GSI Health delivers ACO software and technology solutions that help care networks and Medicaid Health Homes deliver whole patient care.

	Responsibilities:
	· Understanding the Functional Specification Document 
· Discussion of the requirements with the different users of the dashboards
· Understanding the data model and developing dashboards using BI tool Qlik Sense
· Unit Testing by firing queries in the database
· L2/ L3 SQL server support
· Query review and optimization in SQL Server
· Deployment 

	Technologies: 
	Qlik Sense, SQL Server 2008 R2, Apache tomcat server, Jira




	Project: 
	BOX IT

	Duration: 
	October 2015 - January 2017

	Role:
	BI Consultant

	Project Description: 

	BOX-It is a Window based and Web based Application for scanning, managing, storing and delivering the documents of its customers in digital format. It stores physical documents of the customers, scan them and make their repository in the Database to help their customers become more efficient with their document storage.

	Responsibilities: 

	· Requirement Analysis, Creating Reports, Dashboards.
· Data validations.
· The KPIs included: Occupancy, Average Export time, Export and Ingestion failure, No. of Documents scanned per scanner etc.
· The reports included: Total Revenue Full Year, Total Revenue By
             Quarter Detail, Documents per Customer etc.

It include various modules including Sales Management, Accounting/Finance, Maintain inventory and all functions of HR Department & Administration Department.

Anuj Nanda   
Current Employer: KPMG(India)                                                                                           E-mail: anujnanda55@gmail.com  

Designation: Associate Consultant                                                                                           Phone: +91-8076829101,9999211355 
  

 
CAREER 

OBJECTIVE 

 
PROFESSIONAL 

SUMMARY 

 
 
PROFESSIONAL 

SKILLS 

 
To contribute to an organization while utilizing and enriching my overall skills and thus proving 

myself to be an asset for the growth of organization 

 
• Total IT industry experience is 3.5 years (as on October 2019)  

• Currently working as an Associate Consultant in KPMG India, Gurgaon.  

• Performed 6 months of training on Business Intelligence domain at Infosys Limited, Mysore  

  

• Languages: Python, C, C++, Oracle PL/SQL, DAX 

• Database: Microsoft Azure cloud SQL Database, Oracle BI Enterprise Edition(11g), Microsoft SQL Server  

• Database Tools: Microsoft Azure, Oracle SQL Developer, MS SQL Server, Informatica and Toad 

• Reporting Tools: Power BI Desktop, Power BI Service, IBM Cognos, Tableau Desktop 

• Trained Tools: Eclipse, Tableau Desktop, IBM Cognos, Informatica, CTRL-M Scheduling                                             

 
PROJECTS 

UNDERTAKEN 

 
Company:-KPMG(India) 

Designation:-Associate Consultant(Power BI Developer) 

Project Title: Godfrey Phillips India(Data Lake Implementation)(Client Location,APR’19-Till Date) 

Roles & Responsibilities: 

1. Working closely with the client to identify business requirements and develop Power BI Reports and  

Dashboards using Cloudera data lake in Agile methodology Project 

2. Developing Complex Calculated Measures using Data Analysis Expression language(DAX) 

3. Developed Sales report, Supply Chain Management reports and other using DAX functions. 

4. Creating Row level security with Power BI and integration with Power BI service portal. 

5. Scheduled Automatic refresh and scheduling refresh in Power BI service. 

6. Developed analysis reports and visualization using DAX functions like table function, aggregation function 

and iteration functions. 

7. Worked on all kind of reports such as Yearly, Quarterly, Monthly, and Daily 

8. Converting all operational excel report into Power BI Reports 

9. Integrated custom visuals based on business requirement using power BI desktop. 

10. Developing and integrating visual options based on stakeholder and customer requirement using Power 

BI Desktop 

11. Coordinating with team members, developers, analysts for creation of Analytical Solution 

 

Company:- Infosys Limited 

Designation:-Senior Systems Engineer(Power BI-MSBI Developer) 

Project Title: Schlumberger (Technology Life Cycle Management)(Client Location,MAY’18-APR’19) 

Roles & Responsibilities: 

1. Working closely with the client to identify business requirements and develop Power BI Reports and  

Dashboards for Technology Lifecycle Management(TLM).In addition,developing SSAS tabular Model using 

Microsoft Azure Cloud SQL Database in Agile methodology Project 

2. Developing Complex Calculated Measures using Data Analysis Expression language(DAX) 

3. Using ETL SSIS to develop packages for extracting, transforming and loading data into data warehouse 

4. Involved in Cloud Migration of Tableau Dashboard to Power BI Dashboard and Automation using 

SSAS(Tabular) Model and Azure Cloud Database 

5. Developing and integrating visual options based on stakeholder and customer requirement using Power BI 

Desktop 

6. Coordinating with team members, developers, analysts for creation of Analytical Solution 

 

Project Title: PricewaterhouseCooper ETLTeam@Source-MDM (JAN’18- APR’18) 

Roles & Responsibilities: 

  1. Developed PLSQL Packages/Procedures/Functions to populate data into stage tables 

2. Worked on various Backend Procedures and Functions using PL/SQL 

3. Responsible for Analyzing and Implementing the Change Requests in Agile methodology Project 

4. Created packages on SSIS by using different data transformations to load data into database 

5. Used Control Flow task like For Loop Container, For Each Loop Container and Data Flow Task 

6. Imported Source/Target tables from respective Databases by using Execute SQL task and Control Task in SSIS

Sagisu 
Sagisu (Logistics Application)Sagisu is a set of mobile and web applications that is being
built as a solution for stream-lining current goods logistics. It provides a technological
solution to the currently unstructured logistics by providing a platform to B2B and B2C,
for booking a truck, creating orders with multiple pick-ups and drops, assignment of
orders to drivers (manually, auto-assign, broadcasting to multiple drivers, admin assigning,
incremental broadcasting), dynamic pricing engine, route-optimisation, real-time tracking,
online payments, Geo fencing, invoicing, reports, admin consoles, heat-maps, offline
capabilities, rating-modules, etc. 
Sagisu 
 
PetSitter 
PetSitter connects loving dog walkers, sitters, boarding with pet owners just like you in all
major cities & can help you get a loving trusted Pet sitter who can board your dogs & cats
in moments after you make a request.  
Backend Technologies - Node js , Mongodb , Redis, APNS (Notification),Express js,
Socket.io. 
 
Squabble 
The newest and most interactive social Debate app for Android and IOS. 
Where the minds of knowledgeable people from around the world meet to debate. 
Squabble is a social debate app for android and IOS that allows users to debate and argue
with others.  
There are all sorts of categories in the app that allow you to express interest in certain
areas and view peoples opinions on topics that interest you.  
When others post their debates, you can join as a audience and like, comment and vote to
your contestant whon you like. You can also comment directly on arguments if you would
like to reply to someone.  
Backend Technologies - Node js , Mongodb , Redis, Fcm (Notification),Express js, Socket.io,
twilio,Opentox ( live streaming)

Projects Undertaken

Education

Project Name	   : Software Support to Ecommerce Sellers Oct 2016 – till date
Client	   : Britt & Jules (USA) 
Role		: DB Consultant
Data Base	   : SQL Server 2012

Description	
· Responsible for planning and designing SQL Server specifications, understanding database definition, structure, and long range requirements directly from end customer. 
· Define, track, and maintain standard baselines and configuration sets of all managed and/or monitored database instances and servers and implement industry best practices with regards to the following: 
	Resource allocation and monitoring
	Performance problem identification and resolution assistance
	Clustering, replication, log shipping, mirroring and Always On Availability Groups
	Data security and recovery
	Data and database health practices. 
· Develop and maintain storage strategies, establishing system documentation and database recovery processing. 
· Identify and initiate resolutions to user problems associated with database performance and database capacity, utilizing best practices to maximize up time and server utilization.
· Support web application development, with a focus on helping the team interact with the database in the most efficient and productive way possible
· Review and deploy the database components for new versions of web applications/products to test and production environments using release management practices.
· Partner with DBA team to provide support in non-business hours, bi-weekly on-call rotation for support
· Help with Data Center migration and migrating on premise db servers to public cloud


Educational Background:


· B Tech From Sunderdeep Engg college in 2016
· Intermediate from U.P Board. In 2012
· High school from CBSE


Personal Details:

Date of Birth: 20 Mar 1994
Marital Status: Single

I am a dynamic, communicative and motivated IT professional with a diverse background and extensive real - world experience in information technology enable service industry. I work creatively and effectively with staff and managers. I am committed to excellent service and customer satisfaction. I am dependable and conscientious; accurate and detailed oriented person I believe that responsive techniques can be used for many assorted areas to effectively characterize, organize and create solutions. I believe that responsive techniques can create a software product inspires and supports others to work at their highest level. I have it in mind to bring about real and practical results for our customers by not only developing applications but also consulting them by design, develop and implement all aspects of a complex project
